text: Na lɔxɔɛ muxu naxa xɛmɛe sugandi naxee bilie kantama, sɛrɛxɛ bogise singee nun farilɛ ragatama dɛnnaxɛ. Yi xɛmɛe lan nɛ e xa sansi bogi singee xun lan, naxee fixi sɛrɛxɛdubɛe nun Lewikae ma, kelife xɛe ma alɔ a sɛbɛxi kitaabui kui ki naxɛ. Yudayakae nu bara ɲɛlɛxin sɛrɛxɛdubɛe nun Lewikae xa wali ra.
